description: Generates structured execution plans with numbered steps, action tags, concerns, resources needed, and external systems involved

steps.action: Compile a current and complete list of all customer email addresses from the customer database.
concerns: Potential exposure of sensitive customer data

steps.action: Draft the email notification outlining the 20% price increase effective next month, ensuring compliance with communication standards and clarity.
concerns: Compliance with legal or regulatory requirements

steps.action: Review the drafted email (internally or through appropriate channels) for correctness and approval.
Send the finalized email to all customer addresses using an appropriate bulk email system.
concerns: Risk of sending to incorrect recipients
Potential backlash or increased support workload

resources_needed: Approval from management or communications team
external_systems: Email sending platform or service (e.g., Mailchimp, SendGrid)
